name: Keter Unfettered
description:
Welcome to Keter Unfettered, a Bullet Hell project designed by a bunch of strangers who met as this Game Jam began! We're just happy to have a game for you all to play. This was such a wonderful learning experience for us all. Thank you for taking the time to play!

Take control of an unnamed Keter level SCP threat as you dodge, punch, and shoot your way to freedom!

Everything was made during the jam. No premade assets were used in this game. Just a LOT of tutorials.
